title: Annales. Histoire, Sciences Sociales
additional-notes: This periodical published under several different titles between 1929 and the present.  See the Online Books Page listing for details about its title history.

This is a French publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Alison Miner for copyright research on this title.
